articles.title: DPRK-U.S. General-level Talks Held
articles.content:
DPRK-U.S. General-level Talks Held
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK-U.S. general-level talks were held in Panmunjom on March 2 and 6 at the proposal of the Korean People's Army side.
					 Present at the talks were the delegation of the KPA side led by KPA Major General Kwak Chol Hui and the delegation of the U.S. forces side led by U.S. Air Force Major General Johnny Weida.
					
					 At the first-day talks the head of the delegation of the KPA side roundly exposed the aggressive and dangerous nature of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military war exercises, large-scale DPRK-targeted saber rattling, to be staged by the U.S. forces side together with the south Korean puppets from March 9 to 20, citing the arms buildup and military exercises perpetrated by the U.S. forces side recently. 
					
					 He solemnly clarified the principled stand of the KPA on the above-said war maneuvers. 
					
					 He declared that the projected joint military exercises will pose increasing danger as they are timed to coincide with a spate of bellicose remarks let loose by the U.S. and the south Korean conservative forces as regards the projected launch of a satellite by the DPRK. He strongly urged the U.S. forces side to immediately cancel the plan for the exercises for a war of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. forces side tried hard to cover up the aggressive nature and purpose of the exercises at any cost, insisting that they are "annual ones" and aimed at "defense".
					
					  The projected saber rattling which the U.S. forces side is going to stage by mobilizing huge troops and modern operational hardware as it did in the past goes to prove that the promise made by the new U.S. administration that it would seek a negotiated settlement of the Korean Peninsula issue is no more than flamboyant rhetoric, he noted, adding that whether the U.S. forces side meets the DPRK's request for suspending the large-scale joint military exercises or not will serve as a barometer showing whether the new U.S. administration is set to follow in the footsteps of the preceding administration which pursued a hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 That day the U.S. forces side said it would seriously examine the DPRK's request for the immediate suspension of the said exercises and in order to give an answer to it the former proposed resuming the general-level talks on March 6.
					
					 At the talks on March 6, too, the U.S. forces side justified the exercises and charged that the DPRK's preparations for the satellite launch for peaceful purposes and the action taken by it to disallow south Korean airliners flying in the air above the East Sea of Korea pose threats. 
					
					 The head of the delegation of the KPA side made it clear that the satellite launch is an independent right pertaining to a sovereign state under international law, adding that it was an entirely just measure for self-defense for protecting the security of the DPRK for it to have taken the above-said action at a time when the U.S. is putting military pressure upon it and posing threat to it after amassing aggression forces in the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 He strongly warned the U.S. forces side that as long as it does not cancel the DPRK-targeted war exercises, the KPA will take strong countermeasures to cope with the policy taken by the new U.S. administration, judging that the U.S. hostile policy to bring down the DPRK by force of arms remains unchanged and in that case the U.S. forces side will be held fully accountable for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spreads to Men of Merited Service
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spreads to Men of Merited Service
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Labor Hero and Dr. Jang Jong Su, manager of the Samhung Stock Farm, marked his 70th birthday and Labor Hero and Prof. Jong Jong Dae, a teacher at the 2nd Medical Faculty of Clinical Medicine of Pyongyang University of Medicine, his 80th birthday.
					 Born into a poor peasant's family in Taehwa-ri, Uiju County, North Phyongan Province in Juche 28 (1939), Jang Jong Su graduated from a university and has led a true and happy life under the care of the country founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He invented and introduced tens of pieces of valuable technological and innovation initiatives and fulfilled the plan for meat production every year, thus contributing to the development of the nation's stockbreeding.
					
					 Born in Japan in Juche 18 (1929), Jong Jong Dae joined the volunteers' corps and bravely fought to defend the DPRK government, a genuine motherland of the people, during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He graduated from a university in the postwar period, as desired by him, and has devoted his all wisdom and zeal to the promotion of the people's health, the development of the nation's medical science and technology and the training of medical workers true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of public health.
					
					 Birthday spreads of benevolence sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il were conveyed to them.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Germany Diplomatic Ties Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Germany Diplomatic Ties Marked
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Thomas Schafer, German ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy Thursday to mark the 8th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Germany.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the DPRK-Germany Friendship Association, and officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries here.
					
					 Staff members of the German embassy and German guests staying in the DPRK were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Regional Marathon Games Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Regional Marathon Games Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Regional marathon games for the International Association of Athletics Federations - the 22nd Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Contest were held in Pyongyang and local areas.
					The games were divided into the 45km, 21km, and 10km events.
					
					Participated in the game held in Pyongyang were over 300 male and female marathoners selected from 20-odd sports teams and juvenile sports schools.
					
					More than 170 athletes won the qualification for the marathon contest at the game.
					
					More than 130 marathoners were qualified to participate in the contest at the marathon race held in Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province with the attendance of over 250 athletes from nine units including the North and South Hwanghae Provincial Sports Teams. 
					
					A similar race was held in Anju City of South Phyongan Province with the participation of fine athletes from over 10 units including the North and South Phyongan Provincial Sports Teams and Jagang Provincial Sports Team.
					
					The race bestowed the qualification on more than 100 marathoners from the South Phyongan Provincial Sports Team, the Sports Team of Sinuiju University of Medicine and other units.
					
					Some 80 runners were selected in the east sea area marathon game held in Hamhung City of South Hamgyong Province.
					
					The selected runners will take part in the International Association of Athletics Federations - the 22nd Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Contest to be held in Pyongyang in April together with marathoners from various countries.

articles.title: New Books and CDs Produced
articles.content:
New Books and CDs Produced
Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Literature and Art Publishing House of the DPRK has of late brought out new books and CDs. 
					The Juche literature collection (seven) "Leader and Writers" contains stories of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has led the writers with paternal affection.
					
					The full-length novel "Star over Vast Plain" deals with the heroic struggle to which Kim Chol Ju, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, dedicated all his wisdom and energy, upholding the lofty intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Also among the books and CDs are the full-length novel "Spring in My Native Town" reflecting the efforts of young constructors who built a hydroelectric power station during difficult "Arduous March" and CDs including the collection of one hundred songs for guitar (two) and the collection of songs for accordion accompaniment (one).

articles.title: Construction of Hydroelectric Power Stations Changes Looks of Country
articles.content:
Construction of Hydroelectric Power Stations Changes Looks of Country
Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Many hydroelectric power stations have been built in the DPRK these years, which are greatly conducive to the economic construction and the people's livelihood and have changed the looks of the country beyond recognition.
					The large-size hydroelectric power stations built in Kangwon, North Hwanghae and North Phyongan Provinces are supplying ample electricity to the economic sectors.
					
					The commissioning of the Wonsan Youth Power Station and Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No.1 made it possible respectively to solve the problem of drinking water in Kangwon Province and to irrigate fully the vast rezoned Yonbaek Plain.
					
					The power stations built along Taeryong River protect these areas from flood damage like embankment.
					
					Hundreds of minor power stations constructed over last ten-odd years are providing enough electric power to local industry factories so as to put their production on normal track and to dwelling houses for their lighting and heating.
					
					With the completion of their construction, the Hungju Youth Power Station No.2 and Kumjingang Hungbong Youth Power Station have put thousands of hectares of arable land under protection from drought and flood damage in Kanggye City of Jagang Province and Hamju County of South Hamgyong Province and secured irrigation water there.
					
					The areas of the power stations have turned into artificial lakes, cultural recreation grounds, fish-breeding ponds and bird habitats.
					
					Seen on the artificial lakes are sightseeing boats and on their shores are rest homes and rest buildings for peasants. And a landscape like park has been arranged with curious rocks and forests in their surroundings. The dams across the rivers are used as bridge.
					
					The cosy modern dwellings and rest homes in forests are picturesque in harmony with power stations and surrounding landscape.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Solicitation Diplomacy Ridiculed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Solicitation Diplomacy Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- These days the Lee Myung Bak group is busy asking the U.S., Japan and other countries to increase "sanctions" and "pressures" upon the DPRK, describing the DPRK's preparations for launching a satellite as a "missile launch." This is nothing but wicked and reckless behavior of those hell-bent on doing harm to fellow countrymen and escalating confrontation with them.
					 Minju Joson Friday observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					  The south Korean puppets have pushed the north-south relations to the uncontrollable phase of collapse but are talking a lot about "the frozen south-north relations" and a "serious threat to the regional stability and peace," finding fault with their compatriots' projected launch of a satellite. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The U.S. pursuing a hostile policy towards the DPRK and the south Korean puppets keen on escalating the confrontation with compatriots, pursuant to its strategy for a war of aggression against the DPRK, are the main factors of jeopardizing the stability and peace on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 As a matter of fact, it was announced that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises would be kicked off on March 9, but the U.S. forces stationed in south Korea and the puppet forces have been engrossed in the DPRK-targeted war exercises already since a few days ago. 
					
					 Even a slight accident may become a source of war and trigger off an all-out war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 It is preposterous for them to take issue with the satellite launch by fellow countrymen under the pretext of "regional stability and peace," while keeping mum about the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK stepped up by them against the above-said backdrop.
					
					 The Lee group finds itself in such a miserable position as to implore for support to do harm to compatriots at any cost, lost to shame. 
					
					 He who digs a pit for others falls into it.
					
					 The Lee group's moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots would only precipitate its self-destruction.

articles.title: KCNA Rebukes Lee Myung Bak Group's Impudent "Admonition" over Human Rights Issue
articles.content:
KCNA Rebukes Lee Myung Bak Group's Impudent "Admonition" over Human Rights Issue
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Recently the Lee Myung Bak group has malignantly defiled the dignity and system of the DPRK, saying this or that about "human rights" in it. 
					 A typical example of this was that the vice-minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade" at the 10th meeting of the UN Human Rights Council talked the nonsense that "he hoped the north would fully abide by international law on human rights and fulfill its commitment under the convention on human rights and he urged the north to take necessary measures for the improvement of human rights." 
					
					 As already widely known to the world, the DPRK is a genuine people's country in which everything serves people.
					
					 As the DPRK regards believing in people as in Heaven as the fundamental idea of nation-building and a starting point of state activities, it fully guarantees all its citizens their rights in a responsible manner.
					
					 The people in the DPRK fully enjoy an independent and creative life as the master of the state and society under the socialist system.
					
					 There is no "human rights issue" in the country as everybody leads the most dignified and happy life.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Lee group is talking a lot about "human rights in the north." This is nothing but a despicable farce to tarnish the prestige and image of the DPRK on the international arena.
					
					 It is the south Korean society that is plagued with human rights abuses as a fascist repressive system has been revived there since the emergence of the present ruling forces. 
					
					 The fascist junta is suppressing the just struggle of the organizations of people from all walks of life for national dignity and sovereignty on the charge of the violation of the "National Security Law" and throwing behind bars democratic figures and youth and students who praised the Juche idea.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the junta indiscriminately put down the people who protested against the import of American beef in demand of their right to existence and burned to death evacuees in Ryongsan who staged an action in defence of their cradle.
					
					 Under the Lee group's rule south Korea has turned into a theatre of fascism and a tundra of human rights where democracy is wantonly violated.
					
					 No wonder international human rights organizations including Amnesty International in their annual reports, etc. called for building international public opinion over the human rights abuses in the south Korean society, pointing out that the south Korean authorities are extensively abridging the freedom of expression.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the Lee group of traitors is one of fascist dictators and ferocious murderers as it has converted south Korea into a graveyard of democracy and human rights and a dark society.
					
					 What the group blustered over human rights diametrically runs counter to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in which the north and the south agreed to stop slandering and defaming other side.
					
					 We will never tolerate the above-said reckless remarks slandering the inviolable and dignified DPRK.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities Accused of Blocking Inter-Korean Youth and Students' Exchange
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities Accused of Blocking Inter-Korean Youth and Students' Exchange
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils released a statement on Mar. 2 denouncing the puppet authorities for taking an anti-reunification action to block the exchange and cooperation between youth and students in the north and the south.
					 The statement accused the "Ministry of Unification" of disallowing on Feb. 27 three delegates including the executive chairman of the Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to visit Pyongyang.
					
					 The youth and students headquarters as an organization under the south committee has made positive efforts for the exchange and cooperation between youth and students in the south and the north, the statement said, adding that the action headquarters cannot repress resentment at the action taken by the "Ministry of Unification" to block the working contact, an annual event, finding fault with the youth and students headquarters' just activities.
					
					 Recalling that the Lee Myung Bak "government" has never clarified its will to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration but cried out for making dangerous "preemptive strikes," the statement noted: Yet it is talking about "dialogue," while blocking even simple exchange. This strips bare the very anti-reunification colors of the Lee "government."

articles.title: Struggle against Railroading of Evil Laws Vowed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Railroading of Evil Laws Vowed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party of south Korea released a resolution on Mar. 1 in which it declared a struggle to check the railroading of the evil laws of Lee Myung Bak.
					 The resolution recalled that on the same day the speaker of the "National Assembly" made an ultimatum that if the ruling and opposition parties fail to reach an agreement on the law on media and other evil laws, he would bring all of the laws up for discussion by his authority.
					
					 This proves that he admitted himself as a servant of the "Grand National Party," it pointed out.
					
					 The economy can never be saved with such evil laws, the resolution said, declaring that the DLP would turn out in the struggle to check the railroading of evil laws.
					
					 Meanwhile, the People's Council for Public Welfare and Democracy held a rally in Seoul on Mar. 2, denouncing the puppet authorities for their moves to railroad the anti-democratic evil laws.
					
					 Speakers at the rally condemned the GNP for its sinister moves to railroad the media law and other evil laws through the NA.
					
					 Saying that it is impossible to expect the public welfare and peace in south Korea as long as the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the GNP are allowed to remain there, they stressed that the people of various circles would not stop the struggle to check the railroading of the evil laws.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Koreans Killed during U.S. Air Raids Held in Tokyo
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Koreans Killed during U.S. Air Raids Held in Tokyo
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for the Koreans killed during the U.S. forces' large-scale air raid on Tokyo was held in the city on Feb. 28, 64 years after the atrocity. 
					 Present at the service were members of the Korean Youth League in Japan and the Union of Korean Students in Japan and other Korean residents in Japan and Japanese personages and citizens.
					
					 Introduced there were memorial messages from the DPRK Measure Committee for Demanding Compensation to "Comfort Women" for the Japanese Army and the Victims of Forcible Drafting and the Association of Korean Victims of Forcible Drafting and Their Bereaved Families and the south Korean Committee for Investigation into the Damage Done by the Japanese Imperialist's Forcible Drafting during Their Occupation of Korea.
					
					 Speakers at the service recalled that a large number of Koreans, who had been taken to Japan during its colonial rule, were barbarously killed by the said air raid on Mar.10, 1945.
					
					 They referred to the fact that the remains of 72 dead bodies out of those remains in the Tokyo Metropolitan Shrine have been identified by the Tokyo Fact-Finding Group on Forcible Drafting of Koreans.
					
					 They stressed that they would go ahead with the investigation to identify remains of Koreans.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated
Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Italy and a lecture in Myanmar on Feb. 13 and 16 to mark the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the 35th anniversary of the proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea proclaimed by
					Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of Kim Jong Il, photos showing his immortal feats and books and photos introducing the Korean people in the efforts for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieving national reunification.
					
					 Pasquale Felice, chief of the Firenze Group under the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea, said at the seminar that Kim Jong Il proclaimed the modeling of the whole society on the Juche idea as the highest programme of the Workers' Party of Korea as early as in the 1970s and set forth the strategy of struggle for carrying out the revolution and construction with the Juche idea as the guidelines.
					
					 Kim Jong Il systematized in a comprehensive and integral way the Juche idea authored by President Kim Il Sung to provide the ideological and theoretical weapon for the victory of the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence, he noted.
					
					 The secretary general of the Union Solidarity and Development Association of Myanmar said in the lecture that Kim Jong Il, guided by the noble idea "The people are my God," always shares sweets and bitters with the people while being ready to cultivate a flower on a rock if the people want.
					
					 It is the will of the army and people of the DPRK to fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of the birth of the President under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he said, adding that socialist Korea will emerge victorious thanks to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Se entablan conversaciones militares RPDC-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Se entablan conversaciones militares RPDC-EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ATCC) -- Por la iniciativa de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvieron lugar los dias 2 y 6 en Phanmunjom las conversaciones militares a nivel de general entre la RPDC y Estados Unidos.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes la delegacion de la RPDC presidida por el mayor general del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kwak Chol Hui, y la de EE.UU. encabezada por su par de las fuerzas aereas, Johnny Weida.
					
					En la cita del dia 2 el jefe de la delegacion de la RPDC revelo bien claro las caracteristicas agresivas y la peligrosidad de "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", ejercicio de gran tamano para la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea, que las tropas norteamericanas van a desarrollar del dia 9 al 20 junto con los titeres surcoreanos, citando los datos referentes a los ultimos movimientos de aumento armamentista y ejercicios militares de ellas.
					
					A continuacion, el expuso la posicion de principios del EPC al respecto.
					
					El inminente ejercicio militar conjunto resulta mas peligroso porque coincide con que EE.UU. y las fuerzas conservadoras del Sur de Corea pronuncian sucesivamente los disparates belicosos sobre el lanzamiento de satelite por nuestro pais, subrayo.
					
					Exigio fuertemente que ellos renuncien ahora mismo a su plan de desplegar esa maniobra belica para agredir a la RPDC. 
					
					Al respecto, la parte del ejercito norteamericano intento encubrir a toda costa el caracter agresivo y la meta del ejercicio en cuestion alegando que es un entrenamiento "anual" para la "defensa".
					
					El jefe de nuestra delegacion apunto que el intento de la parte de las tropas norteamericanas de desplegarlo movilizando a numerosos efectivos y modernos equipos operacionales al igual que en los tiempos anteriores comprueba que no pasa de ser una palabra enganosa la promesa de la nueva administracion norteamericana de resolver el problema de la Peninsula Coreana mediante el dialogo.
					
					La aceptacion o no por la parte de las tropas norteamericanas de nuestra demanda sobre la suspension del ejercicio sera la pauta para ver que la nueva administracion norteamericana repetira o no la politica hostil a la RPDC de su antecesora, enfatizo.
					
					Ese dia, la parte de las tropas norteamericanas propuso reanudar el dia 6 las conversaciones a nivel de general para dar la respuesta a nuestra demanda tras examinarla seriamente.
					
					  Pero, tambien en la cita del dia 6, la parte de las tropas norteamericanas volvio a justificar su ejercicio militar y acuso a nuestra parte insistiendo en que constituyen una amenaza los preparativos para el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos y la prohibicion de la navegacion de los aeroplanos en el cielo sobre el Mar Este de Corea. 
					
					 Al respecto, el jefe de nuestra delegacion dejo en claro que el lanzamiento de satelite es el derecho independiente de un Estado soberano que le atribuye la ley internacional.
					
					 Seguidamente, refuto en terminos categoricos que la medida de prohibir la navegacion de aviones surcoreanos en el Mar Este justamente cuando EE.UU. ejerce la presion y amenaza militares a la RPDC emplazando en esa area a colosales fuerzas agresoras es una justa medida de autodefensa tomada por la segunda para defender su seguridad.
					
					 Si la parte de las tropas norteamericanas no renuncia a su plan de ejercicio de guerra contra la RPDC, el Ejercito Popular de Corea tomara fuertes medidas a la invariable politica hostil a Corea de la nueva administracion norteamericana juzgando que no se cambio en nada esta politica para aplastar militarmente a aquella, recalco.
					
					  La parte de las tropas norteamericanas asumira la entera responsabilidad de todas las consecuencias que emanen de ello, advirtio severamente.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia ejercicio militar EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia ejercicio militar EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos tratan de librar a partir del dia 9 en toda la extension surcoreana el ejercicio militar conjunto "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" pese a la repetida advertencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y a la unanime denuncia de los nacionales y extranjeros, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 5 una declaracion condenatoria al respecto.
					Este ejercicio constituye una grave provocacion contra la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC y un acto criminal antipaz que pone en peligro la seguridad de la nacion coreana y la situacion regional, subraya la nota y prosigue:
					
					El CRPP denuncia categoricamente en nombre de todos los coreanos ese entrenamiento de guerra anti-RPDC que trae en la Peninsula Coreana el nubarron de guerra nuclear.
					
					Ese macro-ejercicio militar conjunto, que se librara por primera vez despues de la aparicion de la nueva administracion en EE.UU., demuestra que este imperio y los titeres surcoreanos estan locos por desatar la guerra nuclear tras emplazar en gran medida en suelo surcoreano las armas nucleares de todo tipo.
					
					Igualmente, corrobora que son ellos mismos los que impiden la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y esta palabra pronunciada tantas veces por ellos no pasa de ser una cortina para encubrir su intento de agredir a la RPDC.
					
					  El inminente ejercicio militar resulta una peligrosa accion belica, que puede convertirse en cualquier momento en la guerra de verdad, porque se librara cuando fueron invalidados totalmente los acuerdos N-S referentes a la eliminacion de enfrentamiento politico-militar y a la prevencion de conflictos armados debido a la brutal campana de confrontacion con la RPDC de la banda de Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					  Nadie puede prever cual sera el detonante de la guerra en la actual situacion tan tirante en que el Norte y el Sur de Corea se enfrentan con fusiles y canones redoblando al maximo la disposicion de combate.
					
					  Las fuerzas militares de autodefensa de la RPDC no perdonaran cualquier sintoma de provocacion, por muy pequeno que fuera, en el cielo, la tierra y el mar y lo frustraran con resuelto y temible fuego.
					
					 Bajo estas circunstancias tan graves, la RPDC declara que durante el ejercicio "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", no puede garantizar la seguridad de los aviones de la aerolinea civil surcoreana, que pasen por el espacio aereo de la parte Norte, particularmente, por el contorno del firmamento sobre el Mar Este de Corea.
					
					 Estarian muy equivocados EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos si piensan que podran salir de la crisis externa e interna amedrentando a alguien mediante la manifestacion de las supuestas "relaciones de alianza" y las "fuerzas".
					
					 Este intento sirve solo para patentizar su naturaleza conflictiva y agresiva.
					
					  EE.UU. y la banda de Lee Myung Bak deben actuar con prudencia al darse clara cuenta de la resuelta voluntad y temperamento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y el pueblo de la RPDC.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia diplomacia anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia diplomacia anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ATCC) -- En estos dias, la horda de Lee Myung Bak esta suplicando vilmente a Estados Unidos, Japon y otros paises vecinos la "sancion" y la "presion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea describiendo los preparativos de esta para el lanzamiento de satelite como gesto para "disparar misiles".
					En un comentario individual difundido este viernes, el periodico Minju Joson califico tal procedimiento de locura de los fanaticos por calumniar y enfrentarse con los connacionales.
					
					Segun su logica de bandido, los titeres surcoreanos, que llevaron las relaciones N-S a la ruptura irreparable, cuestionan el lanzamiento de satelite por la coterranea RPDC hablando del "congelamiento de las relaciones intercoreanas" y de la "seria amenaza a la estabilidad y la paz de la region", comienza el comentario y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU., que practica la politica hostil a la RPDC, y los titeres surcoreanos, que recurren freneticamente a la confrontacion fratricida siguiendo la estrategia de su amo gringo de desatar la guerra anti-RPDC, son los que amenazan la estabilidad y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Practicamente, aunque fue anunciado que el ejercicio militar conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" comenzaria el dia 9, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y el ejercito titere surcoreano ya entraron hace unos dias en el ejercicio belico anti-RPDC.
					
					La mas minima contingencia en el curso del ejercicio puede ser el detonante de la guerra total contra la RPDC.
					
					Justamente en estas circunstancias, la banda de Lee censura absurdamente el lanzamiento de satelite pretextando la "estabilidad y la paz regionales" haciendo caso omiso de sus maniobras belicistas contra la RPDC. 
					
					La horda de Lee es la de los traidores que no reparan en medios ni en metodos para calumniar y perjudicar a los connacionales.
					
					Segun dice el refran coreano "el que quiere hacer dano a otros sera danado primero", la horda de Lee sera arruinada por su campana de confrontacion fratricida.

articles.title: Actos en Italia y Myanmar por efemerides coreanas
articles.content:
Actos en Italia y Myanmar por efemerides coreanas
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y del 35o aniversario del programa de la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche proclamado por el, tuvieron lugar los dias 13 y 16 de febrero el simposio en Italia y la conferencia en Myanmar.
					  En las ocasiones estaban exhibidos las obras del Dirigente, las fotos alusivas a sus hazanas inmortales, los libros y fotos que dan a conocer la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera y reunificar la patria.
					
					  El jefe del grupo del Comite Italiano de Estudio de la Idea Juche en Firenze, Pasquale Felice, se refirio en su discurso a que ya en la decada de 1970, el Dirigente proclamo la trasformacion de toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche como programa supremo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presento la estrategia de lucha de impulsar la revolucion y la construccion tomando esa idea como guia directriz.
					
					  Continuo que el Dirigente preparo el arma ideo-teorica para alcanzar la victoria de la revolucion coreana y la causa de la independencia de la humanidad al sintetizar y sistematizar integralmente la idea Juche creada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  El secretario general de la Asociacion de Union, Solidaridad y Desarrollo de Myanmar dijo en la conferencia que Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, poseedor del noble ideal Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo), no conoce lo imposible en las labores para satisfacer el deseo del pueblo y comparte siempre con este las penas y las alegrias.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea estan decididos a abrir de par en par las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en 2012, cuando se cumplira el centenario del Presidente Kim Il Sung, bajo la direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, subrayo.
					
					 Anadio que la Corea socialista avanzara victoriosamente bajo la direccion del Dirigente.
